item.description:
Latest update here:   http://www.meetup.com/portlandpermaculture/messages/boards/thread/13272101/#47327161

 

Northeast permaculture people will be gathering again this year for our summer Convergence! Last year we hosted in Maine and this year will be at Camp Epworth in New York's Hudson Valley.

There are field trips, a permaculture marketplace, sessions, keynotes, local/organic food, a family pavilion, music and the return of the perma-lympics!!!  Indoor dorms or outdoor camping are available.  

Lots of details and registration links to be found here:   http://northeastconvergence.wordpress.com/

Register there but RSVP here so we can use the comments thread below to organize convoys!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: 2011 Northeast Permaculture Convergence
